sentences.sentence: He has no doubts about his manliness.
sentences.translation: 他毫不怀疑他的男子气概。

sentences.sentence: Manliness for most dudes is all they have.
sentences.translation: 对大多数男人来说，男子气概就是他们的一切。

sentences.sentence: It was also true that I wanted to show off my new manliness.
sentences.translation: 我想表现出全新的男子汉气概，这也是真的。
